channel.title: Multiple sclerosis on SciBook: analysis of published information about vaccinations and infections
channel.description: Recent content in Multiple sclerosis on SciBook: analysis of published information about vaccinations and infections

item.title: A population-based case-control study on viral infections and vaccinations and subsequent multiple sclerosis risk
item.description: In those who had been vaccinated with MMR before the age of ten, the risk of multiple sclerosis was 5 times higher.

item.title: Aluminum Involvement in Neurotoxicity
item.description: Removing aluminum by chelation therapy in multiple sclerosis patients led to improvement of their symptoms. Patients with neuro-degenerative diseases and multiple sclerosis have much higher levels of aluminum than healthy people.
